GapFillInput.Title: some and any
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type one word in each gap. Use short forms.

Content.Question:
Kim: Hello, Elena. How are you?
Elena: Fine thanks.
Kim: What would you like for breakfast? There 's|is some cereal and we’ve got some toast or
would you like an egg?
Elena: Is there any yoghurt?
Kim: Er … sorry, we haven’t got any yoghurt.
Elena: That’s okay. Can I have a roll and some jam, please.
Kim: Sure. And what would you like to drink?
Elena: A cup of coffee please, with milk.
Kim: I’m sorry, there’s no milk. Can you drink your coffee black?
Elena: No problem. Is there any butter?
Kim: Yes, here you are.
Elena: Thanks.

P.FONT: Photos of Kim and Elena. Two young women at the breakfast table.
Or two single photos. Elena looks South American; slightly dark skinned and Kim is British. Both are in their twenties.
